mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn,no, grade_name, id, passwd, name, email, phone ,gender, role from member order by no desc) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select no, c_no, name, address1, tel, hour from (select *, rownum, rn from restaurant where ${searchOption} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by no asc) r where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select * from (select *,rownum rn from booking b join restaurant r on b.res_no = r.no where ${searchOption} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by b.no asc) where rn between #{start} and #{end}

select * from (select rownum rn, b.no,m.name,r.name as res_name,b.date1,b.date2,b.status from booking b join restaurant r ON b.res_no = r.no JOIN member m ON b.mem_no = m.no order by no desc) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select count(name) from restaurant where name = #{name}
select count(no) from restaurant where address1 = #{addr}
mapper.update: update restaurant set name = #{name}, address1 = #{address1}, hour = #{hour}, tel = #{tel} where no = #{no}
